Question: This person stayed with his old label until 1980.
Hints: In 1956, this person recruited a young all-female singing group named the Cookies, and reshaped them as The Raelettes.
This person, then 31, stated that he had been a drug addict since the age of 16.
In school, this person was taught only classical music, but he wanted to play the jazz and blues he heard on the family radio.
